text: Andrew Sinton (born 19 August 1965) is a British rower. He competed in the men's lightweight double sculls event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:British male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Great Britain Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Windsor, Berkshire
title: Andrew Sinton
